channel.title: Make Slayer Lvl you Up
channel.description:
Hello, I Have 1 Simple question, How Can i make slayer lvl up players, for example max lvl right now is 126, i want max level to be 138, and if you dont know what i mean ill try to gointo more details.
uhh, ok lets say i have all 99 combat skills, except for slayer, my level would be 126, but once i start lvling up slayer my combat level increases, and once my slayer is 99, my combat level would be 138. help please, Appreciated.
